channel.title: Cybersecurity, Cloud and Compiler
channel.description: Insights into Cybersecurity, Cloud computing, and Compiler

item.title: An InfoSec Architect's First Taste of Temporal
item.description: This is a therapy session for anyone traumatized by fragile scripts. I traded my `cron/try/catch` nightmares for a robot project manager named Temporal.
item.author: nerd@supasaf.com (Supa Safe)
